# Pull Request Template

## Summary

- What does this change accomplish? What issue does it close? (optional)
- Provide any context needed for reviewers.

## Testing

- Describe how the change was verified:
  - `pnpm lint`
  - `pnpm test`
  - `forge test`
  - Other (describe)

## Checklist

- [ ] Code builds (`pnpm build`, `forge build`, etc.)
- [ ] Tests are passing
- [ ] Documentation is updated (README, STARTUP_GUIDE, etc.)
- [ ] No breaking changes unless explicitly documented
